author: Omarrrrrr97
title: Transfer txn
review_text: With all due respect to the Bank Muscat staff, especially the development department, I suggest that you cancel the feature that prevents transfers of more than 500 riyals during the first 24 hours when adding a new user account. This feature has nothing to do with security or protection. When you add the account, you can know and verify the beneficiary’s account name and account number. I apologize for taking too long and I hope that the matter will be looked into in the public interest. Thank you.

review_text: I'm facing an issue where the QR is not getting captured while scanning — the screen remains still and doesn’t proceed to payment. Please note: I'm using the Bank Muscat QR scan and pay option daily without any issues for the past month. But since July the scan feature has stopped working on Android phones.
